pages.text: $(li)Slingshot is a tool which can be used to shoot blocks.$(br)$(li)Shot blocks will place themselves wherever they land if the position is suitable.

$(li)A Slingshot can be enchanted with $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/quick_charge)Quick Charge$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/multishot)Multi Shot$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:enchanting/supplementaries/stasis)Stasis$(/l).
